#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int T,n,m,s;
int gcd(int x,int y)
{
	if(y==0) return x;
	return gcd(y,x%y);
}
int main()
{
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T--)
	   {scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
		s=gcd(n,m);
	    printf("%d\n",m-s);
	   }
	return 0;
}
